name: The Unseen
description: The Unseen is a multiplayer thriller FPS in a one VS many format. Terminate The Unseen with modern day weapons or hunt the S.W.A.T. from the shadows.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: i5 2400, FX-6300 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 650, R9 260X DirectX: Version 12 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: i5 6500, AMD FX-8350 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 980, RX 570 DirectX: Version 12 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space
